mapper.insert:
insert into workshop_info
workshop_info.full_name,
workshop_info.input_code,
workshop_info.is_delete,
workshop_info.line_id,
workshop_info.operator,
workshop_info.short_name,
workshop_info.track_division_id,
workshop_info.workshop_type,
workshop_info.create_time
values
#{fullName},
#{inputCode},
#{isDelete},
#{lineId},
#{operator},
#{shortName},
#{trackDivisionId},
#{workshopType},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update workshop_info
workshop_info.full_name = #{FullName},
workshop_info.input_code = #{InputCode},
workshop_info.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
workshop_info.line_id = #{LineId},
workshop_info.operator = #{Operator},
workshop_info.short_name = #{ShortName},
workshop_info.track_division_id = #{TrackDivisionId},
workshop_info.workshop_type = #{WorkshopType}
workshop_info.update_time= current_timestamp
workshop_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select workshop_info.create_time, workshop_info.full_name, workshop_info.id, workshop_info.input_code, workshop_info.is_delete, workshop_info.line_id, workshop_info.operator, workshop_info.short_name, workshop_info.track_division_id, workshop_info.update_time, workshop_info.workshop_type form workshop_info
workshop_info.id = #{id}
